Getting started

1

View the demo tutorial (connect to Capgemini network!) View the demo tutorial

There is currently one rather technical demo, simulating a few use cases of a restaurant management application. My Thai Star.

2

Setup the develop environment

The DEVON IDE setup guide will guide you how to get your development environment up and running.

3

Get the code

The code is hosted on Github, here is the DEVON4js application template repository.

4

Read the tutorial

Read and follow the tutorial at DEVON4js Client Tutorial

5

Help making DEVON even better

Remember this is a joint effort and you are welcome to contribute.
